trans-unit.source: Click here to update reference index:
trans-unit.target: Click here to update reference index:

trans-unit.source: Click here to test reference index:
trans-unit.target: Click here to test reference index:

trans-unit.source: TYPO3's reference index keeps track of the relations between records. As it can happen that the reference index contains outdated values, you can check and update it here.
trans-unit.target: TYPO3's reference index keeps track of the relations between records. As it can happen that the reference index contains outdated values, you can check and update it here.

trans-unit.source: You can also run the check as a shell script using CLI if the processing takes longer than the PHP max_execution_time allows.
trans-unit.target: You can also run the check as a shell script using CLI if the processing takes longer than the PHP max_execution_time allows.

trans-unit.source: To check the reference index use:
trans-unit.target: To check the reference index use:

trans-unit.source: To update the reference index use:
trans-unit.target: To update the reference index use:

trans-unit.source: Make sure that a BE user with the name _cli_lowlevel exists. For more details see: /path/to/your/typo3/sysext/lowlevel/HOWTO_clean_up_TYPO3_installations.txt
trans-unit.target: Make sure that a BE user with the name _cli_lowlevel exists. For more details see: /path/to/your/typo3/sysext/lowlevel/HOWTO_clean_up_TYPO3_installations.txt

trans-unit.source: If you run these commands from the command line, make sure that a BE user with the name _cli_lowlevel exists.
trans-unit.target: If you run these commands from the command line, make sure that a BE user with the name _cli_lowlevel exists.

trans-unit.source: Use formatted strings, labels and dates instead of original values for results
trans-unit.target: Use formatted strings, labels and dates instead of original values for results

trans-unit.source: Don't use original values in brackets as prefix for labelled results
trans-unit.target: Don't use original values in brackets as prefix for labelled results

trans-unit.source: Sort selectbox-options for relations by label and not by value
trans-unit.target: Sort selectbox-options for relations by label and not by value

trans-unit.source: Show even deleted entries (with undelete buttons)
trans-unit.target: Show even deleted entries (with undelete buttons)

trans-unit.source: ERROR: Directories deeper than the following number of levels:
trans-unit.target: ERROR: Directories deeper than the following number of levels:

trans-unit.source: Click to move this lost record to rootlevel (pid=0)
trans-unit.target: Click to move this lost record to rootlevel (pid=0)

trans-unit.source: This will analyse the content of the tables and check if there are 'empty' relations between records or if files are missing from their expected position.
trans-unit.target: This will analyse the content of the tables and check if there are 'empty' relations between records or if files are missing from their expected position.

trans-unit.source: Files referenced from more than one record:
trans-unit.target: Files referenced from more than one record:

trans-unit.source: Files with no references at all (delete them!):
trans-unit.target: Files with no references at all (delete them!):

trans-unit.source: This shows all pages in the system in one large tree. Beware that this will probably result in a very long document which will also take some time for the server to compute!
trans-unit.target: This shows all pages in the system in one large tree. Beware that this will probably result in a very long document which will also take some time for the server to compute!

trans-unit.source: This shows some statistics for the records in the database. This runs through the entire page-tree and therefore it will also load the server heavily!
trans-unit.target: This shows some statistics for the records in the database. This runs through the entire page-tree and therefore it will also load the server heavily!

trans-unit.source: This searches through all database tables and records for a text string.
trans-unit.target: This searches through all database tables and records for a text string.

trans-unit.source: Will search recursively for filenames in the PATH_site (subdirs to the website path) matching a certain regex pattern.
trans-unit.target: Will search recursively for filenames in the PATH_site (subdirs to the website path) matching a certain regex pattern.

trans-unit.source: Check and update global reference index
trans-unit.target: Check and update global reference index

trans-unit.source: Allows you to maintain the reference index kept by TYPO3.
trans-unit.target: Allows you to maintain the reference index kept by TYPO3.
